Interface Content

All Known Implementing Classes:
ContentProxy
public interface Content

The content of an area.

Method Detail

getAsset

public Asset getAsset(java.lang.String id)
               throws RepositoryException
Parameters:
id - The node ID.
Returns:
A node with a specific ID.
Throws:
RepositoryException - if an error occurs.

getAssets

public Asset[] getAssets()
                  throws RepositoryException
Returns:
All content nodes in this area.
Throws:
RepositoryException - if an error occurs.

addAsset

public Asset addAsset(AssetType type)
               throws RepositoryException
Parameters:
type - The asset type.
Returns:
The added node.
Throws:
RepositoryException - if a node with this ID already exists or the document type is not registered.

getArea

public Area getArea()
             throws RepositoryException
Returns:
The area this content belongs to.
Throws:
RepositoryException - if an error occurs.
